function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Pandemics like the coronavirus disease can lead to significant psychological impact, exacerbated by socio-economic inequalities and uncertainty about the future.","Impact":"Worsened living conditions for millions of people without income security, unemployment insurance, or savings.","Mitigation":"Implement social support programs, provide income security, and address socio-economic inequalities.","Technologies":"Telemedicine, remote mental health support, and digital financial assistance.","People":"Millions of people around the world without income security or savings.","Owner":"Governments, NGOs, and international organizations."},{"Description":"Lockdowns prevent people from going to work, leading to prolonged economic impacts and potential worsened living conditions.","Impact":"Increased poverty and limited access to basic necessities due to prolonged unemployment.","Mitigation":"Provide financial support, access to essential services, and tailor communication to vulnerable communities.","Technologies":"Digital platforms for financial assistance, e-commerce for essential goods, and remote work solutions.","People":"Workers affected by lockdowns, especially those without savings or unemployment insurance.","Owner":"Governments, employers, and community organizations."},{"Description":"Overloaded health systems and fear of infection deter people from seeking medical care, leading to potential high mortality rates and strain on health facilities.","Impact":"High mortality rates, lack of access to medical care, and strain on health facilities.","Mitigation":"Increase medical capacity, promote telemedicine, and address fear of seeking care through public health education.","Technologies":"Telemedicine platforms, remote monitoring devices, and digital health information dissemination.","People":"Patients in need of medical care, especially in countries with weak health systems.","Owner":"Health authorities, governments, and international health organizations."}]}
